name: nearness
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the fact of not being far away in distance: I bought my house because of its nearness to the place I work. As he was going to step toward her, she felt his nearness.
the fact of not being far away in time: The episode shocked him into an awareness of the nearness of death. They were oblivious to the nearness of the coming social revolution. See
near
More examplesFewer examplesMars is a fiery colour because of its nearness to the sun. The town is popular with tourists because of its nearness to the ocean.Opposition to the new airstrip focused on the nearness of the proposed site to a wildlife refuge. Some people say that the nearness of death focuses the mind.He said that the nearness of the election made it inappropriate for him to comment.
